originalText.text: Eastside Westside Music Together is a great program. I have been taking both my children to classes there for the past four and a half years and we keep coming back for more. While I have not tried every music class out there for children, this is the only one I've found that actually teaches both children and adults about music and musical development in kids and how music assists with language development, rather than just singing common children's songs. The songs are different each semester and all have different musical components that assist in the musical education of the children. The teachers are all dedicated, approachable and very upbeat. I highly recommend Eastside Westside Music Together if you are looking for a high quality and unique music program for your child.

I highly recommend Eastside Westside Music Together if you are looking for a high quality and unique music program for your child.

originalText.text: We've been taking our now 21 month old son to ESWS Music Together classes since he was 6 months old and he LOVES it. We both do! I definitely credit the classes with his continued love of music which has in turn played a role in his early development of language skills. The routines in the class (e.g. saying "bye bye" to instruments when it's time to put them away) have also helped us manage similar transitions at home, like cleaning up toys when it's time for bed, without tantrums. Highly recommend these classes!

originalText.text: I've been taking my kids to ESWS Music Together classes for 4 years and have had many instructors. They are great classes and the teachers are all very engaging.  We've done other music classes but these are the only ones I've found that actually deal with music education and developing a love of music in children rather than just singing previously known children's songs over and over. These classes are really beneficial to your child's music and general development.

originalText.text: We've tried several music classes in NYC, and ESWS Music Together is definitely a step above the rest! The teachers do a fabulous job at not only engaging the kids (even as early as 4 months!), but also the adults, helping to maximize interaction with your little one.

text.text: We've tried several music classes in NYC, and ESWS Music Together is definitely a step above the rest! The teachers do a fabulous job at not only engaging the kids (even as early as 4 months!), but also the adults, helping to maximize interaction with your little one.

originalText.text: Both my kids have done Music Together and both really enjoyed it and benefited.  Their teacher, Danny, is amazing, warm, and fun.  The classes are organized and inspired.  I also think they both have an appreciation for a variety of music because of the complexity and variety of the music they are exposed to at Music Together.
